original: Sukhasahagataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati
hetupaccayā. Nasukhasahagataṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato nakusalo dhammo
uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sukhasahagataṁ kusalañca nasukhasahagataṁ kusalañca dhammaṁ
paṭicca nasukhasahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
Sukhasahagataṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati
hetupaccayā. Nasukhasahagataṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato naakusalo
dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Sukhasahagataṁ akusalañca nasukhasahagataṁ akusalañca
dhammaṁ paṭicca nasukhasahagato naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā tīṇi
